name: Lost formulas
description:
Small game made for Global game jam / Finnish game jam 2021. 

This is a game about discovering alchemic formulas in order to appease your customer's orders. It is a new day at this ye olde alchemy shop, but the memory of the shopkeeper (you) isn't what is used to be, and to top it off the recipe book is nowhere to be found. So what can you do? Mix and match the various ingredients to find which combination produces the wanted item. Can you discover, and more importantly remember them all?

source code can be found on https://github.com/Plopsiskopsis/Global-game-jam
